sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that 
\[
	\frac{k }{a } = \frac{l }{b } = \frac{m }{c }
\]
Then show that each ratio is equal to
\[
	\left(\frac{7 k ^3 - 6 l ^3 + 8 m ^3}{7 a ^3 - 6 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	\frac{k }{a } = \frac{l }{b } = \frac{m }{c } = d \textrm{ assume}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow k = \input[s1v1]{}d , l = b\input[s1v2]{} , m = cd 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Given expression is
\[
	\left(\frac{7 k ^3 - 6 l ^3 + 8 m ^3}{7 a ^3 - 6 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}
\]
\[
	= \left(\frac{\input[s2v1]{} d ^3 a ^3 - 6 \input[s2v2]{} ^3 b ^3 + 8 d ^3 c ^3}{7 a ^3 - 6 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\left(\frac{\input[s3v1]{} ^3 (7 a ^3 - 6 b ^3 + 8 c ^3)}{7 a ^3 - 6 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}
\]
\[
	= (\input[s3v2]{} ^3)^{1/3}
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	= d 
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Which is equal to each ratio.

Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["a", "d"], "text": "$$\text{After assumption $\frac{k }{a } = \frac{l }{b} = \frac{m }{c } = d$ and taking terms separately we get $k = ad , l = bd , m = cd$}$$"}, {"data": [7, "d"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking the expression, and substituting the value of $k$, $l$, and $m$, in the expression, we get $\left(\frac{7 d ^3 a ^3 - 6 d ^3 b ^3 + 8 d ^3 c ^3}{7 a ^3 - 6 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}$}$$"}, {"data": ["d", "d"], "text": "$$\text{"Upon further simplification of the previous equation we get $\left(\frac{d ^3 (7 a ^3 - 6 b ^3 + 8 c ^3)}{7 a ^3 - 6 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}=(d ^3)^{1/3}$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
